languages.text: "Сожалею. Насчет вас, мастер ван Калокс, никаких особых распоряжений не было".
"I regret to say that no specific instructions were given in your regard, Master van Calox."
languages.original_text: "Сожалею. Насчет вас, мастер ван Калокс, никаких особых распоряжений не было".

traits.locale_text: "I regret to say that no specific instructions were given in your regard, Master van Calox."
traits.speaker: FootfallCh04_Frosche

traits.locale_text: "I regret to say that no specific instructions were given in your regard, Master van Calox."
traits.speaker: FootfallCh04_Frosche

traits.locale_text: "I regret to say that no specific instructions were given in your regard, Master van Calox."
traits.speaker: FootfallCh04_Frosche

traits.locale_text: "I regret to say that no specific instructions were given in your regard, Master van Calox."
traits.speaker: FootfallCh04_Frosche

traits.locale_text: "I regret to say that no specific instructions were given in your regard, Master van Calox."
traits.speaker: FootfallCh04_Frosche

languages.text: « Je regrette, maître van Calox, mais je n'ai reçu aucune instruction précise vous concernant. »
languages.original_text: "I regret to say that no specific instructions were given in your regard, Master van Calox."

traits.locale_text: « Je regrette, maître van Calox, mais je n'ai reçu aucune instruction précise vous concernant. »
traits.speaker: FootfallCh04_Frosche

languages.text: "Bedauerlicherweise wurden keine genauen Anweisungen erteilt, was Euch angeht, Meister van Calox."
languages.original_text: "I regret to say that no specific instructions were given in your regard, Master van Calox."

traits.locale_text: "Bedauerlicherweise wurden keine genauen Anweisungen erteilt, was Euch angeht, Meister van Calox."
traits.speaker: FootfallCh04_Frosche

languages.text: «Maestro van Calox, lamento informarle de que no he recibido instrucciones específicas para usted».
languages.original_text: "I regret to say that no specific instructions were given in your regard, Master van Calox."

traits.locale_text: «Maestro van Calox, lamento informarle de que no he recibido instrucciones específicas para usted».
traits.speaker: FootfallCh04_Frosche

languages.text: 「残念ながら、ヴァン・カロックス様、あなた様の件に関しては具体的な指示はありませんでした」
languages.original_text: "I regret to say that no specific instructions were given in your regard, Master van Calox."

traits.locale_text: 「残念ながら、ヴァン・カロックス様、あなた様の件に関しては具体的な指示はありませんでした」
traits.speaker: FootfallCh04_Frosche

languages.text: “很遗憾，大审判官大人并没有给你留任何特别指示，冯·卡洛克斯大师。”
languages.original_text: "I regret to say that no specific instructions were given in your regard, Master van Calox."

traits.locale_text: “很遗憾，大审判官大人并没有给你留任何特别指示，冯·卡洛克斯大师。”
traits.speaker: FootfallCh04_Frosche

languages.text: "Üstat van Calox, maalesef sizin için hususi yönergeler verilmedi."
languages.original_text: "I regret to say that no specific instructions were given in your regard, Master van Calox."
